channel.title: Solaris
channel.description: I know solaris inst Linux but its Unix. i Have run into a problem with it just as i have with fedora core 7 it wont use 2 cpus on fedora in the boot options i could just add maxcpus=1 in solaris it docent recognize thats command is there a way to make solaris work using 1 core only.
